survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate patient satisfaction with telemedicine services, focusing on ease of use, quality of care, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use telemedicine services?
answer_options: Frequently (6 or more times per year)
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use telemedicine services?
answer_options: Frequently (6 or more times per year)

questions.question_text: Which of the following telemedicine platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following telemedicine platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of scheduling a telemedicine appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for accurate satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of scheduling a telemedicine appointment?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of care received during your telemedicine visits?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of care received during your telemedicine visits?

questions.question_text: What types of medical concerns have you addressed via telemedicine? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: What types of medical concerns have you addressed via telemedicine? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the technical aspects of telemedicine (e.g., video/audio quality, platform stability)?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for accurate satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the technical aspects of telemedicine (e.g., video/audio quality, platform stability)?

questions.question_text: Compared to in-person visits, how would you rate the convenience of telemedicine?
questions.client_notes: Use a comparative scale for direct feedback.

script.question_text: Compared to in-person visits, how would you rate the convenience of telemedicine?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for telemedicine services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for telemedicine services?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend telemedicine services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for accurate recommendation measurement.

script.question_text: Would you recommend telemedicine services to others?

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to use telemedicine more often?
answer_options: Better integration with my primary care provider
